job.title: Machine Learning Researcher / Simulation Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Information Services,Capital Markets
job.description: <p>The high frequency trading team is seeking a Research Engineer to join them in Austin. The role will involve implementing features, models, and strategies in C++ and managing the in-house compute and data cluster, job scheduler, and Python based pipeline to provide robust, efficient 24/7 backtest/simulation/research environment.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong>: </p><ul><li>Strong engineering instincts and a deep understanding of computer science fundamentals.</li><li>Experience in statistical modelling, mathematics. </li><li>An ability to generate research ideas and implement and execute solutions to represent them.</li><li>Innovative, big-picture thinking grounded in real-world pragmatism.</li><li>A desire to continuously improve in a rapidly evolving environment.</li><li>A readiness to set technical direction, promote engineering principles, and do the right thing.</li><li>Strong experience with C++, Python &amp; Linux. </li><li>Experience with GPUs, FPGAs is interesting but not essential.</li><li>Candidates from national labs, high frequency trading firms and top tier tech firms are of particular interest. </li><li>Suitable for candidates with between 4-10 years of industry experiance.</li><li><strong>No financial experience is required. However an interest in financial markets and machine learning in the context of automated high frequency trading is a pre-request.</strong></li></ul>
